metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Learn how we handle your data.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
content: At La Perruquería, we collect the following personal information:
- Owner’s full name
- Contact details (phone number, email)
- Pet’s name, breed, age, and specific needs
- Service history
- Payment information (processed securely)

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use the collected information to:
- Provide and improve our services
- Contact you about appointments, promotions, or service changes
- Process payments
- Keep records of your pet’s health and preferences
- Fulfill legal obligations

sections.title: 3. Information Security
content: We implement security measures to protect your personal data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

sections.title: 4. Sharing Information
content: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal data to third parties without your consent, except as required to deliver requested services or comply with the law.

sections.title: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can set your browser to refuse cookies. However, some features may not work properly if cookies are disabled.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
content: You have the right to:
- Access your data
- Correct inaccurate data
- Request deletion
- Object to data processing
- Withdraw consent at any time

sections.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this policy. Any changes will be posted on this page.

sections.title: 8. Contact
content: If you have questions, contact us at +1 (786) 719-0231 or email privacy@laperruqueria.com.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By using the services of La Perruquería, you fully accept these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
content: La Perruquería provides dog grooming and aesthetic services. Our services include but are not limited to: baths, haircuts, styling, ear cleaning, nail trimming, and other dog beauty treatments.

sections.title: 3. Appointments and Cancellations
content: Appointments can be scheduled by phone, WhatsApp, or through our website.
We ask that cancellations be made at least 24 hours in advance. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a fee.

sections.title: 4. Pet Health and Safety
content: It is the owner's responsibility to inform us of any medical conditions, allergies, or special behaviors of their pet before the service.
We reserve the right to refuse service if we believe it may compromise the health or safety of the pet or our staff.

sections.title: 5. Vaccination
content: All pets must be up to date on their vaccines, including rabies, distemper, and kennel cough.
We may request vaccination records at any time.

sections.title: 6. Pricing and Payment
content: Prices vary depending on the size, breed, and coat condition of the pet.
Full payment is expected at the time of service.
We accept cash and major credit/debit cards.

sections.title: 7. Customer Satisfaction
content: If you are not satisfied with our service, please let us know within 48 hours and we will do our best to resolve the issue.

sections.title: 8. Photography and Marketing
content: We may take photos of pets during or after service for use on our social media and promotional material.
If you prefer we do not photograph your pet, please let us know.

sections.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
content: While we take all reasonable precautions, we cannot be held liable for unforeseen allergic reactions to products, self-inflicted injuries by pets due to behavior, or pre-existing conditions that may surface during or after the service.

sections.title: 10. Changes to Terms
content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
Modifications will take effect immediately upon being posted on our website.

sections.title: 11. Contact
content: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us at +1 (786) 719-0231 or email info@laperruqueria.com.
